author: remm
msg: - Add a vararg variant since it is probably nicer to use in a lot of cases (but keep the NIO2 variant as well since it is more flexible for array reuse).
- Add a block mode since it is trivial to do with the semaphore, it only adds an extra flag argument, and future user APIs might still have blocking IO.

author: julianfoad
msg: On the 'move-tracking-2' branch: Display diffs correctly when a branch is
moved. Previously it showed a branch added and a branch deleted.
(get_subbranches): Correct the hash keys of the result.
